results.name: Column 1 of the array in A107735.
reference: S. Mukai, An Introduction to Invariants and Moduli, Cambridge, 2003; see p. 483.
link: Chai Wah Wu, Table of n, a(n) for n = 3..3324
Index entries for linear recurrences with constant coefficients, signature (0,7,0,-14,0,8).
formula: a(n) = (2^n - 2)/6 if n is odd else 2^(n/2 - 1). - _Peter Luschny_, Mar 26 2019
program: def a(n): return (2^n-2)//6 if is_odd(n) else 2^(n//2-1))
print([a(n) for n in (3..41)]) # _Peter Luschny_, Mar 26 2019
results.author: _N. J. A. Sloane_, Jun 10 2005
ext: More terms from _Chai Wah Wu_, Jun 19 2016
